title: Kiwi and Ginger Smoothie

ingredients.content: 10 - 20 g fresh root ginger, peeled, cut into round circles (2 mm)

preparations.content: Place kale, ginger, kiwis, oranges, lemon juice, cold water and ice cubes in mixing bowl then blend <b>1 min 30 sec/speed 10<b>.
Pour into 2 glasses and serve immediately.

hintsAndTricks: For a thinner smoothie, increase cold water to 100 g.
